english.segment1: I can't relax while laying down. It's alright. They'll come right back. You can't compress with the always used. Give me something new. We want it bad. Can we please come home?. We want it bad. We want it bad
english.segment2: You can't compress with the always used. Please give me something new. We want it bad. Can we please come home?. We want it bad. We want it bad
